sentences: Tunnen, et olen selle kohaga justkui 端hte kasvanud.
context: The Estonian word '端hte' is an adverb with multiple meanings related to unity and collective action. It can mean: 1) coming together or gathering as a group (people, animals, things); 2) pressing or putting together physically; 3) combining into one unified whole through merging, mixing, or joining; 4) indicating agreement, harmony, or being on the same side with someone. The word is used to express various forms of unity, whether physical proximity, collective action, ideological alignment, or emotional connection.
